title: Projects
text:

Summary: Built to optimize media spend for a subscription business.

Live Demo: Link to App
Features: Custom filters, player stats, …




Led A/B and quasi-experimentation work using synthetic controls and Bayesian structural models.

More coming soon.

title: Welcome
text:
👋 Hello, I’m Jon Oses
I’m a data scientist / developer passionate about building clean, impactful solutions.
This is my personal site to share my projects, research, and CV.
📌 Highlights: - 🧠 Interests: Data Science, Causal Inference, Sports Analytics, Bayesian Modeling - ⚙️ Tools: Python, R, Quarto, Docker, Git, PostgreSQL - 🧪 Currently working on: Project Title

Feel free to explore or reach out
